categories: Category:Battles of the Second Imperial Civil War

nodes.text: Attack on the Galactic Alliance Core Fleet

The Attack on the Galactic Alliance Core Fleet began when the Sith Imperial navy's First Coruscant Task Force jumped out of hyperspace and surprise-ambushed the Galactic Alliance Defense Fleet, causing their forces to scatter between multiple hyperspace jumps of their own. Galactic Alliance Admiral Gar Stazi was seriously wounded by shipman Tealart, a Mon Calamari traitor, during the initial phase of the battle. The Alliance fleet eventually made their way to the Teraab sector where they were pursued by the Imperials, but managed to turn the tide of the battle in their favor as their enemies jumped out of hyperspace behind them.
